snippet: Saudi Arabia and the United States have worked closely together against a militant network in Yemen, most recently foiling an effort to smuggle a bomb onto a jetliner.
abstract: Saudi Arabia and the United States's successful attempt to foil a plot by Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula to smuggle a bomb onto a US-bound jetliner offers a glimpse of the crucial partnership the two countries have developed to stamp out militant networks in Yemen.

byline.original: By ROBERT F. WORTH and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia and the United States have worked closely together against a militant network in Yemen, most recently foiling an effort to smuggle a bomb onto a jetliner.

headline.seo: Years of U.S.-Saudi Teamwork Led to Airline Plot’s Failure
headline.main: Long-Running Antiterrorism Work With Saudis Led to Airline Plot’s Failure
headline.print_headline: Long-Running Antiterrorism Work With Saudis Led to Airline Plot’s Failure

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
